About Me

A little peak to my background.

Bio

Social medias

I am very active in social medias. Most of the time I Perfer instagram because I have a lot followers and it helps me reach a wider audience.
I'm very interested in collaborating with other programmers. I have a good communication skill and I'm have a huge curiosity on discovering other peoples approch when solving real world problems and help in the process of writing the code.
So I"ll be glad if you reach out.

Education background

I haven't decided which major course I should take for now, but my altimate goal is to learn in depth what AI is and actually be a part of a community that is deeply invested in it.
